author: Monte Pittman
text: Tonight we’re in Seattle at the @showbox - Thank you all so much who have felt like showing up and came out to see us. This has been one of the most memorable touring experiences I could ever dream of. I’m so thankful to be with all of these amazing people. @weareministry https://t.co/IlpAlnFhRU

author: Monte Pittman
text: Tonight we’re in San Francisco at @thewarfield 📷 @rj51photos /// @weareministry - Only 1 more show left on this tour. We’ve had the most amazing time. #espguitars #randyjohnson #randyjohnsonphotography #aljourgensen #montepittman #ministry @espguitars @seymourduncanpickups https://t.co/Qw0YKzrW1H

author: Monte Pittman
text: Sounds like it’s either San Fran or Detroit. I still think it’s a lie. Jefferson Airplane never actually built a city. Those cities already existed. Like the Kung Fu Fighting guy. There’s no way that EVERYBODY was doing that at the same time.

author: Monte Pittman
text: Did anyone ever specify WHICH song was built on rock & roll?

author: Monte Pittman
text: Of course! Trust no one. Ever. https://t.co/IfmZfXUSua

author: Monte Pittman
text: Admiring the architecture of The Alamo while resting our thumbs on our belts with @csotoministry @roymayorgaofficial @weareministry  while contemplating when @ozzyosbourne got arrested here even though there’s literally blood all over the walls inside… #deepthoughts https://t.co/2xZEqV1f9L

author: Monte Pittman
text: This is right before we all got into a fight…. Only so we can say that we fought at The Alamo… There was no touching of the hair and face, of course. @weareministry @johnbechdelofficial @roymayorgaofficial @pmdamour @csotoministry #thealamo https://t.co/8WUF0L3cUY

author: Monte Pittman
text: Last night I told Pepper there’s a vending machine with Bud Light at The Alamo… It was good. We had a great time. You can call us crazy….. @coccabal #pepperkeenan #thealamo #budlight  @roymayorgaofficial @weareministry  #ministryband #montepittman #corrosionofconformity https://t.co/h25f76FAGy
